page.title: 14Religion
page.content: Most people say that they are not religious. Most people do not attend a church but if asked their religion most say that they are Church of England. In our town there are many different churches and chapels - most of them are just over one hundred years old. The Roman Catholic Church is in the old (1856) Town Hall Building. The churches are not very well supported except at Christmas, Easter and for weddings and funerals. The Christian Evangelical Fellowship Group seems to be developing a growing following.
